title: ColumnGroup
description: Definition for grouping columns together under a common header

column_group_id.description: Unique identifier for the column group

priority.description: Sort priority for the column group (lower values appear first)

label.description: Display label for the column group header

description.description: Optional description or tooltip text for the column group

collapsible.description: Whether the column group can be collapsed/expanded

defaultExpanded.description: Whether the column group is expanded by default (if collapsible)
